name: Nathan Gourley & Laura Feddersen are making an album
blurb: Laura and Nathan are working on their debut album of Irish Traditional Music on two fiddles, with guitar backing from Brian Miller.

name: 'Mandala' - Monsoon's Debut Studio Album
blurb: Help us finish our musical Mandala: an inspiring journey of global vibrations that will take you on a journey of discovery within. •ॐ•

name: Squeaky Music's New Album is Made in Bogotá!
blurb: Squeak has been on a four year musical journey in Colombia and this album is filled with new sounds from her encounters along the way.

name: Jig to a Milestone's New CD!
blurb: Jig to a Milestone's 2nd CD, Crawford's Pub, will be a rip roaring rendition of classic pub tunes, sweet ballads and soaring shanties.

name: Jim Norman and James Cleveland: Glad Tidings
blurb: A Fiddle and Concertina CD for the Holidays!

name: Preserving Afro-Caribbean Music: Leonor Dely & Millero Congo
blurb: Preserve Afro-Caribbean/Colombian music by supporting the latest Leonor Dely & Millero Congo album Esto es Fe. In memory of David Dely.

name: Eternal Fire Fundraiser
blurb: We are creating an album to ignite the internal flames with Eternal Fire. Help Jus Wright's conscious reggae music reach new heights.

name: Wise Innocence: A New Album by Alicia Mathewson
blurb: A long awaited new recording from singer/songwriter & sacred sound healer Alicia Mathewson. Songs, Chants, Inspiration for the Journey

name: Frederic Chiu recording "Hymns and Dervishes"
blurb: Eastern and Western musical traditions meet, in these collaborations between philosopher-mystic Gurdjieff and composer de Hartmann.

name: The Voice of an Angel Healing Mantra Album
blurb: A sacred healing mantra album to heal hearts and raise spirits - I need your help to finish it.

name: With You - Album Crowdfund
blurb: Following on from the first album, the much awaited 2nd album is ready for final touches, production and release.

name: Tipsy Oxcart's Album of Funky Mediterranean Madness
blurb: Hot Balkan originals & tricked-out traditionals. Together, let's tip the Oxcart and shake the dance-floor! SEE OUR STRETCH GOALS!

name: The "Artist Incubator" by Desi Music Entertainment
blurb: Introducing DME - the "Artist Incubator" that nurtures, teaches, produces, and promotes up-and-coming musicians internationally.

name: Navatman Music Collective Premier Album
blurb: This project is to support the album release of the Navatman Music Collective, a unique NYC-based Carnatic a capella style vocal group.

name: Yamakiya Taiko Fukushima Japan - US Concert Tour 2016
blurb: Help Yamakiya Taiko to fly to MI USA from Fukushima Japan! The concert will be held on Mar 22nd 2016 at the Power Center, Ann Arbor MI!

name: A Hammered Dulcimer Christmas
blurb: Nostalgic Christmas: Music from a Simpler Time. The 2nd Album by Dancing Hammers, A Hammered Dulcimer Duo.

name: REGGAE THERAPY (the inexpensive alternative)
blurb: REGGAE THERAPY, an album by Louie Fleck has 11 original songs, 11 radical dub versions of each song & features NYC Reggae Collective!

name: Second Album EP "Hapalua" - The best cover songs in Hawaiian
blurb: My second EP with brand new originals and some cool cover songs, PLUS the chance to hear your your favorite song in Hawaiian. Come see!

name: ContraBanned: #MusicUnites @ SXSW
blurb: Help us bring artists representing the nations of the #travelban to SXSW! Stretch goal: $23K by Midnight Tuesday!

name: Piano & Santoor - A World Music Orchestral Album!
blurb: "The world's first music album that combines cinematic orchestra with Indian classical -- Featuring the piano and santoor

name: JOACHIM HORSLEY VIA HAVANA: Music Video and Album Series
blurb: An album and video series combining Classical and Afro-Caribbean music in new piano-driven "re-compositions" for various ensembles.

name: Aloha Autism Benefit CD
blurb: Aloha Autism is an album featuring songs by over a dozen of the top names in Hawai'i's music scene, to benefit people with autism.

name: Filippo Dall'Asta's Debut Album - Mediterrasian
blurb:
I'm making my first ever solo album!

The erratic energy of Gypsy jazz meets the meditative sonorities of Indian music.

name: TEMPLE OF SILENCE ++ New Album by Naren K. Schreiner
blurb: Enchanting, soul-stirring arrangements of Paramahansa Yogananda's 1938 Cosmic Chants and the original Bengali songs that he loved.

name: Ongtupqa - Hopi Music & Cultural Connections to Grand Canyon
blurb: CD & DVD sharing Hopi cultural connections to Grand Canyon, with music and video recorded at Grand Canyon National Park.

name: Pachamama CD - Inadevi & Deva
blurb: Wir: Inadevi & Deva freuen uns über Deine Unterstützung für die Finanzierung unseres neuen Mantra-CD Projekts "Pachamama".

name: Recording an EP-A Compilation of Melodic Memories
blurb: Music, fashion, and impacting visuals are all parallel. Please support my journey to create a bilingual EP.

name: Hawaii Whalesong - An Inspiring & Unique Music Collaboration
blurb: Producing music albums, blending Hawaiian Humpback Whalesongs with healing relaxation music and lively dance music.

name: Ragani is Recording a NEW ALBUM!
blurb: Ragani is recording a new album of mantra music for meditation, healing and awakening the light within

name: Music for the Soul
blurb: The first full length album of soothing etheric healing sounds of music and Light language from Reiki Master Dammah Debbie Chisholm

name: Pia Salvia's New Album
blurb: Original music by harpist and vocalist, Pia Salvia, featuring the harp in different genres. Be part of the journey!

name: JB & Charles | Fiddle & Concertina Duet Album
blurb: An album of Irish Traditional Music from Doolin, Co. Clare

name: Un-bow
blurb: A first SOLO album of Knurl: A solar-powered, programmable & hybrid cello

name: Time to make my album! - Solange Prat
blurb: It's all about connecting through my music

name: SONICO - "Eduardo Rovira: Inedito e Inconcluso"
blurb: Support the creation of our second album and filming of the concert release

name: Saving lost recordings of Costa Rica's musical legend
blurb: Funds needed to digitalize 50 hours of historic recordings of Walter Gavitt Ferguson

name: Roots of Creation: Dub Free or Die
blurb: Like everyone, COVID-19 hit us pretty hard. With our 2020 touring plans scrapped, along went our recording budget. Your support helps!

name: The Dakini Collection
blurb: A Limited Edition 4xCD digipack

name: Resistencia Sonora: Ovejas, Sucre
blurb: An album series featuring gaita music of resistance from Ovejas, (Sucre) in the Montes de María region of Colombia.

name: NEW ALBUM DUE COMETE Lica Cecato & Stefano Scutari
blurb: 30 years after their first duo album, Lica and Stefano use the lockdown to realise a new musical project with 12 original songs.

name: "Learn to play the Shakuhachi: book by Marco Lienhard
blurb: A wonderful collection of original and traditional songs/ scores for the Shakuhachi, with instructions for beginners and intermediate

name: Evening of Kirtan & Guided Meditation with Ragani
blurb: Join us for this special reunion event! A community evening of Kirtan and Guided Meditation with Ragani

name: Beehive ⬡ World Music ⬡ Album and Film Pre-Release
blurb: ⬡ Made in a Beehive to Inspire Connection to Ecosystems and World Cultures ⬡ Filmed and Recorded Live ⬡ Grammy Award Sound Engineer ⬡

name: Epiphany Machine: new music by Louie Fleck
blurb: Eleven new songs in a quirky Brooklyn Reggae style and eleven psychedelic dub versions. Bonus tracks and special exclusive rewards, too
